row.process:
! --------------------------------------------- :SET &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'RZBatchKSM_Bearb' :SET &BEARBEITER# = '400' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&BEA_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#.out' :SET &INPUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/nb42p800_&TS#.out' ! ---------------------------------------------
:INC JOBI.BS20_EXPORT_LOGDIR
cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# ANZAHL = &ANZAHL_VTR# OHNE_KSMWSSST = &OHNE_KSMWSSST# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# BESCHREIBUNG = &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# KSM_USER = &KSM_USER# BEARBEITER = &BEARBEITER# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# INPUTFILE = &INPUTFILE# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
